channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Everything announced at MWC 2026: The new Leica Leitzphone by Xiaomi, Honor's ultra-thin MagicPad 4 and more
item.description: MWC 2026 officially gets underway on March 2 and will continue through March 5, but the announcements are already coming ahead of its start. We can always count on the annual tech event to bring tons of new phones, laptops and tablets, and we're expecting to see some robots and other gadgets too — plus plenty of AI news, of course. In addition to the announcements, MWC is our chance to get hands-on time with some of the most interesting new devices, like the Xiaomi 17 Ultra.Engadget’s Mat Smith is on the ground in Barcelona, and we'll be updating this story as the week goes on to keep you in t...

item.title: First Film to Depict a Robot Discovered in Michigan
item.description: Created in 1897, it's over two decades older than the term "robot."

item.title: Alaska could be the next state to crack down on AI-generated CSAM and restrict kids' social media use
item.description: Alaska's House of Representatives unanimously passed HB47, a bill that imposes sweeping limits on when and how minors use social media apps, along with bans on generating or distributing harmful deepfakes of children. The bill's original form was focused on prohibiting the possession and distribution of sexually explicit images of children using AI, but Alaska lawmakers decided to add amendments that would impose social media restrictions. The proposed limitations include a statewide curfew on using social media between 10:30 PM and 6:30 AM, banning "addictive design features" and requiring so...

item.title: Le rapport entre un Dacia Duster 4×4 et une Porsche, des grosses promos AUDI, et un alléchant VTC électrique Decathlon – Récap’ Survoltés
item.description: L’actualité Survoltés a été dense cette semaine, entre l'innovation technique du Dacia Duster 4x4, les tendances et régulation côté voitures électriques, et les nouveautés sur les vélos électriques et l’énergie. Voici le récapitulatif des articles les plus consultés cette semaine sur Survoltés.

item.title: I never thought I'd say this, but the Steam Machine might be done for before it even arrives — but one choice from Valve can save it from the RAM crisis
item.description: The Steam Machine might be in big trouble launching during the RAM crisis, but one controversial measure from Valve might save it.

item.title: AT&T vs Verizon vs T-Mobile — which carrier has the strongest Galaxy S26 deal right now?
item.description: Wondering whether to switch? I'm breaking down who has the best value Galaxy S26 preorder promotion right here.

item.title: Amazon fait -32% sur un robot tondeuse capable de s’occuper de 2 000m² de jardin sans efforts
item.description: Le Dreame A1 Pro est une version évoluée du Dreame A1 qui s'occupe de votre jardin sans aucun câble périphérique. Ce modèle est vendu 1 079 euros au lieu de 1 599 euros à son lancement.

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures manettes de jeu à acheter pour un iPhone en 2026 ?
item.description: Envie de jouer plus confortablement sur votre iPhone ? Le mieux est d'utiliser une manette compatible. Celle-ci pourra être connectée via un câble, le Bluetooth ou encore se présenter sous forme de pad extensible. Voici notre sélection des meilleures manettes pour iPhone en 2026.

item.title: If you love bass as much as I do, you’ll adore Skullcandy’s new gaming headset — but it comes at a hefty cost
item.description: The Skullcandy Crusher PLYR 720 certainly nail the bass — but is all that bass really worth the price of admission?

item.title: Shuttered studio Bluepoint reportedly pitched a Bloodborne remake, but it got shot down by FromSoftware
item.description: Bloodborne fans may not be happy to hear that a remake was reportedly rejected, but that doesn't mean it's completely off the table. Bluepoint Games, Sony's closed-down studio behind many PlayStation remakes, pitched remaking the classic Gothic horror RPG in early 2025, but was blocked by the game's developer, FromSoftware, according to a Bloomberg report. As Bloomberg reported, Bluepoint pitched a Bloodborne remake after several years of working towards a live-service title in the God of War franchise that was ultimately canceled. Looking for the next project, a modern-day version of Bloodbor...

item.title: Spotify's latest app upgrade is going to appeal to audiobook fans — here's what's new
item.description: If you're a Spotify user in the US or the UK, you can now see audiobook charts inside the app.

item.title: ‘Sinners’ Gets an NPR Tiny Desk Concert That’s So Damn Good
item.description: Buddy Guy and Miles Caton don't summon any spirits, but listening to them together will make your day better.
